mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.f_erpid AS "erpId", a.f_classid AS "classId.id", a.f_number AS "number", a.f_name AS "name", a.f_model AS "model", a.f_unit AS "unit", a.f_erpclassid AS "erpclassId", a.f_modifytime AS "modifyTime", a.f_erpnote AS "erpNote", a.f_status AS "status", a.f_salePrice AS "salePrice", a.f_describe AS "describe", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.f_name AS "itemClassName"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_icitem( id, f_erpid, f_classid, f_number, f_name, f_model, f_unit, f_erpclassid, f_modifytime, f_erpnote, f_status, f_salePrice, f_describe, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{erpId}, #{classId.id}, #{number}, #{name}, #{model}, #{unit}, #{erpclassId}, #{modifyTime}, #{erpNote}, #{status}, #{salePrice}, #{describe}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_icitem SET f_erpid = #{erpId}, f_classid = #{classId.id}, f_number = #{number}, f_name = #{name}, f_model = #{model}, f_unit = #{unit}, f_erpclassid = #{erpclassId}, f_modifytime = #{modifyTime}, f_erpnote = #{erpNote}, f_status = #{status}, f_salePrice = #{salePrice}, f_describe = #{describe}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
